mapper.select:
select
,
from special_cases
admission_number like CONCAT(#{admissionNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and name like CONCAT(#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and pathology like CONCAT(#{pathology,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
order by id desc
